entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is mentioned as someone who fell a second later.

entities.name: candelabra
entities.description: The candelabra gave way and caused Neville to fall.

entities.name: bell
entities.description: The bell rang, causing a mad rush towards the exit.

entities.name: lockhart
entities.description: Lockhart straightened up and caught sight of Harry, Ron, and Hermione.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as one of the people Lockhart saw.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as one of the people Lockhart saw.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as one of the people Lockhart saw.

relationships.description: Lockhart asked Neville to nip the rest back into their cage.
